body: With concerns about the spread of the coronavirus, we are doing more to keep our courts and tribunals cleaner.

components.html: If you see something that puts you or others at risk, tell us.

Weâ€™ve published additional guidance for all court and tribunal users during the coronavirus outbreak. This will be regularly updated as and when new advice and guidance becomes available. [https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-courts-and-tribunals-planning-and-preparation](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-courts-and-tribunals-planning-and-preparation)

heading: Let us know
